titleStmt.title: Psalm the XX. Verse. The Lord hear thee in the day of trouble, the name of the God of Jacob defend thee
titleStmt.author: Tudway, Thomas, 1655 or 6-1726.

notesStmt.note: At bottom of page: Jul.5.1681. In die comit. T. Tunway, pro gradu music. Bacalaur. Coll. Regal.
Title is from text. Text is in two columns on each page.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
